sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhang 障 , screen [of the eyes], brought forth by heat evil. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry na qi xi 那耆悉：取汁洗目，主赤爛熱障 , “If the eyes are rinsed with its juice, this will master redness, festering, and heat screen ”. Re zheng 熱證 , pathological heat condition [11]

Pathological Condition identical with re 熱 , heat. Shang han lun 傷寒論 141: 寒實結胸無熱證者，與三物小陷 胸湯 , “If there is a bound chest because of cold repletion but no pathological heat condition , treat with the ‘minor decoction with three items that sink into the chest ’”.
